titleStmt.title: Two sermons The first preached at St Maries in Oxford Iuly 13. 1634. being Act-Sunday. The second, in the cathedrall church of Sarum, at the visitation of the most Reverend Father in God William Arch-Bishop of Canterbury, May 23. 1634. By Thomas Laurence Dr of Divinity, and late Fellow of Allsoules Colledge, and chaplaine to his Maiesty in ordinary.
titleStmt.author: Laurence, Thomas, 1598-1657.

titleStmt.title: Two sermons The first preached at St Maries in Oxford Iuly 13. 1634. being Act-Sunday. The second, in the cathedrall church of Sarum, at the visitation of the most Reverend Father in God William Arch-Bishop of Canterbury, May 23. 1634. notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: [A]² a-e⁴ A-D⁴ E² .
"Of schismes in the Church of God" (running title) has separate pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
